pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computing Individual Components of the Gini and the Theil Indices // Computes individual contributions to the overall Gini and Theil's T and Theil's L measures and their decompositions by groups such as race, gender, national origin, with the three functions of iGini(), iTheiT(), and iTheilL(). For details, see Tim F. Liao (2019) doi:10.1177/0049124119875961.
